Heartbleed
Team 50s 3307 Group Project. A platformer game where you, the user, is spawned in as a computer bug with the goal of infiltrating and infecting the computer system. Navigate through the terrain, avoid/defeat enemies, enjoy a beautiful soundtrack and attempt to conquer the final boss.
